mapper.update: update `Account` set tradePassword = #{tradePassword}, usableAmount = #{usableAmount}, freezedAmount = #{freezedAmount}, borrowLimit = #{borrowLimit}, version = version + 1, unReceiveInterest = #{unReceiveInterest}, unReceivePrincipal = #{unReceivePrincipal}, unReturnAmount = #{unReturnAmount}, remainBorrowLimit = #{remainBorrowLimit} where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select id, tradePassword, usableAmount, freezedAmount, borrowLimit, version, unReceiveInterest, unReceivePrincipal, unReturnAmount, remainBorrowLimit from `Account` where id = #{id}
